name: Hanover Investors
overview:
Hanover is a specialist active investor in recovery and turnaround situations.

Hanover invest primarily in:

Public market securities, typically equity.

New equity for leveraged buyouts and recapitalisations of public companies.

Private investment opportunities, typically distressed situations.

Hanover will expect to play an active role in each of these investments and will therefore seek positions of influence, usually with significant equity stakes. These investments will be operationally oriented, either with some fix required to the current operations and structure of the business, or pursuing a growth opportunity by consolidating the market place.
